Title: PodFest Naija 2025: Minister emphasises importance of podcasts in Nigeria
Summary: Minister of Art, Culture and the Creative Economy, Hannatu Musa Musawa, emphasised the importance of podcasts in Nigeria . Musawa spoke at Nigeria’s PodFest Naija 2025 . He said podcasts are powerful tools for shaping narratives and amplifying African voices .

Title: Pandemonium in Oyo community as youths block Alaafin from leaving Twin Festival venue
Summary: Security shot tear gas to scare off urchins, says Alaafin’s media aide . There was pandemonium in Igbo-Ora, Ibarapa area of Oyo State, as a sea of youths blocked the convoy .

Title: ASUU declares two-week strike, orders members to down tools on Monday
Summary: Academic Staff Union of Universities (ASUU) has announced the commencement of a two-week ‘total strike’ and ordered its members to withdraw their services across the country . ASUU President, Prof. Christopher Piwuna, disclosed this at the weekend .

Title: Peter Obi takes Nigeria’s burdens to God in  Rome
Summary: Peter Obi says he has taken Nigeria’s challenges before God during a spiritual pilgrimage to Rome . Obi had earlier visited the United States to speak at the Friendship Club and the 1st Friendship Club . Former presidential candidate of the Labour Party, Peter Obi, says he is taking Nigeria's challenges to God .

Title: Firm completes repayment of $10m loan from NCDMB Intervention Fund
Summary: Tamrose Limitedchas announced the successful repayment of a $10 million loan it obtained in 2019 from NCI Fund . Firm completes repayment of $10m loan from NCDMB Intervention Fund .

Title: Tinubu committed to fortifying future of youth —  Art Minister
Summary: Hannatu Musawa stressed that President Bola Tinubu is considering measures to fortify the future of young people . Art Minister Hannatu musawa said the President is committed to fortifying future of youth .

Title: 2026 WCQ: ‘Calm down o’ – Moment Nigerian fans warn Nwabali at Uyo airport [Video]
Summary: Super Eagles goalkeeper, Stanley Nwabali, received a frosty reception from fans in Uyo . The Nigerian team arrived ahead of their crucial 2026 World Cup qualifier against Benin Republic on Tuesday .

Title: 2027: Gbenga Daniel canvasses support for Tinubu’s re-election
Summary: Senator representing Ogun East, Chief Gbenga Daniel, has called on Nigerians to support the re-election of President Bola Tinubu in 2027 .

Title: Stop demarketing your country, Umahi tells Nigerians
Summary: David Umahi has called on Nigerians at home and abroad to stop de-marketing the country . He urged them to promote national unity, optimism and patriotism .

Title: ‘One day, I want to coach the national team’ – Zidane speaks on France job ambition
Summary: Zinedine Zidane confirmed Sunday he would one day like to coach the France national team . The Frenchman did not say if he was hoping to take over from outgoing boss Didier Deschamps .
